333b6: rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang /
333b7: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan las shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal med khang de dga' bar
333b8: bar snang bar byas shing de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag med ga'ang
334a1: byed thams cad ni mi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du mi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig phebs par gnas//

334a6: dga'abar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa' byed thams ca ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa/
334a7: 'du byed thams cad mi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du mi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyu ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams lta su zhig yod khebs par gnas shes chos
334a8: ston to/ / rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems

334b3: myangan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyung ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyob

334b6: ngas yid 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

334b8: chub sems dpa' semad pa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da'

336a1: chos ston to/ / rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis

336a3: zhen pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/
336a4: rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
336a5: sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ / rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i
336a6: klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig/
336a7: lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

336b1: ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

336b3: skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to//

336b7: 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shang / sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
336b8: sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmang du byung ba'i chos so/ / rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi
337a1: khams ga gA' klung ga byes med dag na/ byang chubs su sa dpa' sems dpa' ran po rnams sams can gang nangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag sa/ rgya sogs po dag so/
337a2: thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta bskyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa'i de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems
337a3: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du
337a4: byung ba'i chos so/ / rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/
337a5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gso/
337a6: dang gsob sha stag la ci zhig la bskyed ces lta ba'i rnas pa de dag dang thal bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing
337a7: sems can rnams la chos ston to/ / rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mad byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor das yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi sa
337a8: gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs
337b1: pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la kye thogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang gsob sha stag la ci zhig la baspyad ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang
337b2: bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnamasal chos ston to// rab 'byor den
337b3: che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ steng gi
337b4: phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang klu'i klung gi bye ma snyed dge na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la kye grogs
337b5: po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang / gsob sha stag la ci zhig la bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste// rab 'byor
337b6: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
337b7: sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ / rab 'byor das yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi mas
337b8: gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na sbyin pa dang tshig snyan pa dang /
338a1: don spyad pa dang / don 'thun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung
338a2: gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang don 'thun
338a3: pa'o/ / rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
338a4: chen po dag mi rnams bsdu pa'i dngos po bzhis srud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig ldan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don 'thun pa'o// rab 'byor gnas 'di nas sna ng+yas rgyas kyi
338a5: spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dag ma rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis
338a6: sdod pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don 'thun pa'o// rab 'byor des yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'dzag rten la rnam par gzigs na/
338a7: byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams snga ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste
338a8: bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don 'thun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar lhor
338b1: phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang
338b2: zhen/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don sdud pa dang / don 'thun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho rab kyi
338b3: 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma skad dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsngo ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthongaste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin
338b4: pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don 'thun pa'o// rab byang ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'dage rkyen la rnas par gzigs na/ rab byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'dzig
338b5: rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis smad pa mthong / bzhi gang zhen/ sbyin pa dang / ga
338b6: snyad pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don 'thun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gAl
338b7: klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don /
339a1: spyad pa dang / don 'thun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzugs na/ stang gi phyogs kyi 'dog rten gyi khams gang gA'i glang gi khyim spyo
339a2: dbus byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag se rnasas bsdu ba'i dngos pa bags srung pa mthong / bzhi gang nas sbyin pa dang / tshigastan pa dang / don snang ba dang / don 'thun pa'o//
339a3: ra rgyan na na na sa 'a
339a4: snang ba yin na na/ rab byor 'a byung chubasams dpa' sems dpa can smyan pa nas kyis sems can rnas pa da du/ gnas ga na
339a5: 'di lta ste/ zar zing
339a6: sbyin pa dang / chos ston pa'o// rab 'byor dper na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang zing ga sbyin pas sems can rnams srung ba yin na na/ byang rdzum sems dem ma mo 'i
339a7: nams ma/ sam 'am/ kladrug+sas / sa sa/ ma sa su// zung ba // byug pa 'a// 262/ nanas/ ts+tsha ba 'am/ byud med ngas/ s+yA du 'a/
339a8: po 'am/ bdag po yongs su gtor na/ 'di skad du kyi sems can dag tshur shog/ bdag nyid kyi dang 'dra bar bslang mi dgos par khyer cig/ la la dang shog ces brjod pa
339b1: sbyin pa de phyin nas sangs rgyas la skyabs su gtong ngo / / chos la skyabs su gtong ngo // dge 'dun la skyabs su gtong ngo // la lan bslab pa'i gnas lnga 'dzin du 'dzud do// la la nA
339b2: yan lag brgya dang ldan pa'i nye bar gnas pa la nye bar gnas par byed do/ / la la ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la 'god do// la la ni bsam gtan dang po la 'god do// lal ni
339b3: bsam gtan gnyis pa la 'god do/ / la la ni bsam gtan gsum pa la 'god do// la la ni bsam gtan bzhi pa la 'god do// la la ni byams pa la 'god do// la la ni snying rje la
339b4: 'god do/ / la la ni dga' ba la 'god do// la la ni btang snyoms la 'god do// la la ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la 'god do// la la ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la
339b5: 'god do/ / la la ni chung zad med pa'i skye mched la 'god do// la la ni 'du shes med 'du shes med myin skye mched la 'god do// la la ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul
339b6: lo/ / la la ni chos rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni dge 'dun rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni tshul khrims rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skal lo// la la
339b7: ni gtong ba rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo/ / la la ni lha rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni lus la mi btsang ba la sogs pa'i 'du shes su so sor brtag pa
339b8: la yang dag par skul lo/ / la la ni rnam par dag pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni yang dag par spong ba bzhal
340a1: yang dag par skul lo/ / lal ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la yang dag par sprul la// lal ni dbang po lnga la yang dag par sprul lo// lal na stobs lngal yang dag par skal la//
340a2: lal ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la yang dag par sprul lo// la la ni 'phags pa'i lam yan na lag brgyad pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
340a3: pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par skul lo/ / la la ni rnam par thar pa brgyad la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang dag par skul lo//
340a4: la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni byams
340a5: pa chen po la yang dag par skul lo/ / la la ni snying rje chen po la yang dag par skal lo// la la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni mi chen
340a6: po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis yongs su grub par bya ba la yang dag par skul lo/ / la la ni dpe' byad bzang po brgyad bcu la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yang
340a7: dag par skul lo/ / la la ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni dgra bcom pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo//
340a8: lal ni rang byang chub la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni lam gyi rnam pas shes pa nyid pa la yang dag par stsal lo// lal ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo// rab 'byor de ltar
340b1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la zang zing gi sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang bde ba dang
340b2: ldan par 'god de/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
340b3: pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor gnyis po 'di dag ni chos kyi sbyin pa ste/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// rab
340b4: 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa gang zhe na/ 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams brjod pa dang / bshad pa dang ma nor bar bstan pa ste/ 'di ltar mi gtsang ba'i rnam pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi
340b5: dang tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i chos byis pa so so'i skye bo dag dang thun mong
340b6: dugyur pa rnams te/ rab 'byor de ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des 'jig rten gyi chos kyi/ sbyin pa de btang nas/ rnam grangs
340b7: mis 'jig rten gyi chos ma nor bar blangs pa de las skyed do/ / de las bskyod nas thabs mkhas pas/ 'phags pa'i chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu dag la rab tu 'god de/
340b8: de la 'phags pa'i chos rnams ni gang / 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni gang zhe na / 'phags pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
341a1: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang // dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
341a2: ba dang / smon pa med pa rnams so// 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid de/ rab 'byor
341a3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o// dgra
341a4: bcom pa nyid shes pa'o/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// bsam gtan
341a5: gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// nang stong pa nyid shes pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid shes pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid shes pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o// chen
341a6: po stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid shes pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// thog ma dang tham
341a7: med pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o// mi dmigs
341a8: pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi shes pa'o// yang dag pa
341b1: spong ba bzhi shes pa'o/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi shes pa'o// dbang po lnga shes pa'o// stobs lnga shes pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun shes pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes pa'o//
341b2: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi shes pa'o// bsam gtan bzhi shes pa'o// tshad med pa bzhi shes pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi shes pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad shes pa'o//
341b3: bzar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgra shes pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i na snang ba nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / ston pa med pa shes pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams shes pa'o//
341b4: re 'dzin rnams shes pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs pas shes pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi shes pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shes pa la/
341b5: rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad shes pa'o// byams pa chen po shes pa'o// snying rje chen po shes pa'o// dga' ba chen po shes pa'o// btad snyoms chen po shes pa'o// gzhan yang 'jig rten pa
341b6: dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i chos rnams dang / 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams shes pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
341b7: pa nyid kyi ye shes ma gtog par de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams so/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras
341b8: bra gang zhe na/ bag chags kyi 'tshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu'o// de nas tshang
342a1: ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par
342a2: 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro//
342a3: gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang
342a4: de bzhin gshegs pa la bye brag ci zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bye brag yod do// gsol pa/ bye brag ji lta bu zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub
342a5: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes brnyes pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang la gnas shing chos thams cad
342a6: la mun pa med pa 'thob pa la/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyang gzhan la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med do// rab
342a7: 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa ste/ de la brten pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa 'byung ngo // rab 'byor da ltar na byang chub sems
342a8: dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa la sbyor zhing / thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa la bkod nas/ rnam pa thams
342b1: cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la 'god pa yin no/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa bye ba sa so'i skye bo thams cad dang / thun mong ma yin
342b2: pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa
342b3: lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
342b4: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
342b5: dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu dang gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams te 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
342b6: bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste nang gi lus dang phyi'i lus dang / phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags
342b7: sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do// lus la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la kun
342b8: 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ / lus la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do// nang gi tshor ba dang phyi'i tshor ba dang / phyi nang gi tsher
342b9: bal tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing / rnam par spyod do// tshor ba la kun
343a1: 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ / tshor ba la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// tshe rab la kun 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// tshor ba la me gnas pa
343a2: rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do/ / nang gi sems dang phyi'i sems dang phyin pa gi sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa
343a3: dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do// sems la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// sems la zad pa'i rjes su
343a4: lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ / sems la kun 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// sems la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing / 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do// nang
343a5: ga chos dang / phyi'i chos dang / phyi nang gi chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par gsal
343a6: cing rnam par spyod do/ / chos la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la kun 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod
343a7: do/ / chos la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing / 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do// rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba bzhi gang zhe na/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i
343a8: phyir/ mos pa skyed pa dang / skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir/ rtsol ba dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir mos pa skyed cing / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang skyes pa rnams 'phel zhing shin
343b1: tu rgyas par bya ba dang brtsam pa yangs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mas pa bskyed pa'o/ / rab 'byor rdzu 'dral gyi rkad pa bzhi gang zhen mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spang ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi
343b2: pa dang / sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spyod pa'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i
343b3: 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o/ / dbang po lnga gang zhe na/ dang pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ de
343b4: dgan dbang ba ldanas bya'o/ / stobs ldag nan/ dang pa'i skabs dang / brtson 'grus kyi skabs dang / dran pa'i skabs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyiskabs ste// de dag nas pas
343b5: nas bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan
343b6: dag pa pa dag byung rngub rjelan lag dang / tu byung ba yang dag cung chub kyi yan lag dang / nga 'dun yang da byung chub kyi yan lagrwa dang / bta rnams yang dag byang chub kyi marnams/
343b7: dadag byang chub tu yan lag bdun zhes b+ha'o// rang 'byor 'a pags pa mam ldan la/ bcad pa ga shin/ 'dres skye yang ga pa ba dang pa nga / TIrtag pa dang / yang dag pa'i dag dang / yang dag pa
343b8: dang yang dag la ba dang / yang dag pa la ba dang / yang ga pa na pa dang pa dag pa 'a 'dzi / dang / phags pa'i ma ma shes bya//
344a1: gsum gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par
344a2: sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni stong pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o//
344a3: smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ mi rtag pa'i rnam pa da sdug bsngal gyi rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni ston pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gyis ba#
344a4: rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang pa'o/ / nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar
344a5: pa gsum pa'o/ / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye b.rA bsgrubs te/ gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga
344a6: pa'o/ / cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// 'du shes med 'du shes me min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o// 'du shese
344a7: dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'di la la la 'dod pas
344a8: dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de la rnam par rtog
344a9: pa dang bcas par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bdab can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nyebar
344b1: bsrubs te gnas so/ / de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang brel bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong ba la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang
344b2: ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal yang spangs
344b3: shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas ky-i nub pas/ bde ba yang med sdug bsngal yang med pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la
344b4: bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la
344b5: mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la
344b6: yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas
344b7: mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad tu cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang
344b8: dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shos med min sa mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes mid min ste mched las yang dag par 'das
344b9: te/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/ 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o// de la mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu gang zhe na/ mtha' dag mdang mthA dag drung
345a1: mtha' dag me dang / mtha' dag rlung dang / mtha' dag sngon po dang / mtha' dgaser po dang / mtha' dag dmar po dang / mtha' dag dkar po dang / mtha' dag rnam par shes pa dang / mtha'
345a2: dag nam mkha' ste/ de dag ni mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu zhes bya'o// de la zil gyis mngon pa'i skye mched brgyad gang zhe na/ nang gzugs su 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs phra mo dang / kha dog
345a3: sdug ga dang / kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang / gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po'o// nang gzugs
345a4: 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs rags pa dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang / gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa
345a5: de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o/ / nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs phra mo dang / kha dog sdug gu dang / kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang / gzugs de dag zil gyis
345a6: mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing // de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis mnon pa'i skye mched gsum pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs rags pa dang /
345a7: kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang / gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa'o// na
345a8: gzugs med par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po// kha dog sngon po sngon por snang ba/ kha dog sngon po 'di lta ste/ dper na me tog oM ma ka lta bu'am/ yul bA rA na sIr byas pa'i gos ltar
345b1: sngon po/ / kha dog sngo ba sngo bar snang ba/ kha dog sngo bar mthong yang / gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched
345b2: lnga pa'o/ / nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po/ kha dog ser po ser por snang ba/ mdog ser po 'di lta ste/ dper na shing kar shi ra'i me tog lta bu'am/ yul bA rA/
345b3: ser byas pa'i gos ltar ser ba/ kha dog ser ba ser bar snang ba/ mdog ser bar mthong yang / gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa 'di
345b4: ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa'o/ / nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po/ kha dog dmar po dmar por snang ba/ mdog dmar po 'di lta ste/ dper na man 'ji
345b5: bka'i me tog lta bu'am/ yul bA rA na sIr byas pa'i gos ltar dmar ba/ kha dog dmar ba dmar bar snang ba/ mdog dmar bar mthong yang / gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan
345b6: te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bdun pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar po/ kha dog dkar po// dkar por snang ba/ mdog
345b7: dkar po 'di lta ste/ dper na skar ma ba ba sangs kyi 'od lta bu 'am/ yul bA rA na sIr byas pa'i gos ltar dkar ba/ kha dog dkar ba dkar bar snang ba/ mdog dkar bar mthong yang / gzugs de dgazil
345b8: gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad pa'o// de la nyon mongs pa med pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan la gnas nas byang chub
346a1: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par spyod pa sems can pha rol dang / gang zag par la gyi nyon mongs pa ma skye ba'i mthu yod pa ting nge 'dzin gangags 'grub pa de na nyan mongs pa med pa
346a2: zhes bya'o/ / smon lam gyi shes pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan la gnas te 'di shes par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dus gsum gyi shes pa'am/ shes pa gang dang gang 'dod par
346a3: gyur pa de la yid kyis smon pa byed de/ de ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas de'i smon lam de yongs su grub par gyur cing / shes bya de yang shes pa de ni smon lam gyi shes pa zhes bya'o// de la mngon par shes
346a4: pa drug gang zhe na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes
346a5: su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ste drug po de dag go/ de la yongs su dag pa bzhi gang zhe na/ lus yongs su dag pa dang / dmigs pa yongs su dag pa dang
346a6: sems yongs su dag pa dang / ye shes yongs su dag pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go de la dbang bcu gang zhe na/ tshe la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba
346a7: dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba ste/ bcu po de dag go/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
346a8: gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnas la yang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
346b1: rab tu mkhyen to/ / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las dang las yongs su blangs pa'i rnam par smin pa gnas kyi rnam pa dang / rgyu'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu ma khyen to//
346b2: khams snga chags can dang / khams dum can gyi 'jig rten yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi mos pa sna tshogs dang mos pa dram yang dag
346b3: ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ / sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi dbang po rab dang / tha ma shes par bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// kun tu 'gro ba'i lam yang
346b4: paji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon
346b5: mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dgongs te/ tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dgongs pa nas/ tsha rabs
346b6: brgya dang / tshe rabs stong dang / tshe rabs brgya stong dang / tshe rab bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar du yang rjes su dgongs so// bskal pa gcig kyang rjes su dgongs pa nas bskal pa brgya'i bar
346b7: dang / bskal pa brgya phrag dum dang / bskal pa stong phrag dum dang / bskal pa brgya stong du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bar drug kyang rjes su dgongs te/ bdag ni 'di lta buzhig
346b8: na'ajug 'jug go/ / ming na 'di zhes bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi 'di zhes bya bar gyur to// rus ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to// zas ni 'di zaza'o// yun ni 'di srid cig druganas gnasas/
347a1: mtha'i ni 'di tsam zhig du gyur te/ bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba nas de nas shi 'phos nas kyang / 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas
347a2: sa mal dang bcas/ gtan tshigs dang bcas par rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dgongs so// lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas sems can 'chi 'phob dang / skye ba dag kyang gzigs
347a3: so/ / kha dog sdug pa dang mi sdug pa dang / bzang ba dang / ngan pa dang / sheng 'gron labod pa dang / ngan song na 'khod pa dang / las ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'dod pa'i sems can rnams rab tu mkhyen te/
347a4: sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa dag gis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa log par lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i
347a5: rkyen gyis lus zhig nas ngan song log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye'o/ / sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis
347a6: legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur ba mi 'debs pa yang dag par lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha'i nang du skye'o zhes bya bar rab
347a7: tu mkhyen to/ / zag pa rnams zang ba'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba zag pa med pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// bcu po de dag ni de bzhin
347a8: gshegs pa'i stobs so/ / rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas nas/ de la chos 'di rnams
347b1: mngon par sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya ba bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam tshangs pa 'am skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur
347b2: ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag pare rjes su ma mthong bas bdag bde ba thob pa dang bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs
347b3: che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ / 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra ba sgrog go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na/ dge sbyong ngam bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung
347b4: ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/ de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to zhes bya bar bdag
347b5: la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par
347b6: rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas
347b7: su dam bca'o/ / 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/
347b8: chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bstan pa de dag la bsten na bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur ro zhes dge sbyong ngam/
348a1: bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par
348a2: rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i
348a3: gnas su dam bca'o/ / 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrog go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/
348a4: chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par
348a5: zad par 'gyur bar bstan pa de dag la nan tan byas na/ sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar mi 'byung ngo zhes/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/
348a6: skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten pa chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas de la bdag
348a7: bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrog go// tshangs pa'i
348a8: 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong dam/ bram ze'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o//
348b1: zhes bya ba ste// bzhi po de dag ni mi 'jigs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang chos so so yang dag par
348b2: rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/ de dag kyang gang zhe na/ don la dmigs pa dang / chos la dmigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig la dmigs
348b3: pa dang / spobs pa la dmigs pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsrung ba med pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sku'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs
348b4: pa la sku'i spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mda' bas/ la las shes su 'ong zhes gang yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba med pa dang po'o// de bzhin gshegs
348b5: pa ni gsung gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsung gi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas/ la las shes su 'ong zhes gang yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin
348b6: gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba med pa gnyis pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su ma dag
348b7: pa mi mnga' bas/ la las shes su 'ong zhes gang yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba med pa gsum pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa nye bar
348b8: gzhag pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa'i mi/ la las rna ba btud de rim gror nyan cing / bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa dang / chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan
349a1: byed na yang des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par mi 'gyur/ yid bde bar ma 'gyur/ thugs yang yang por mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po'o// la la rna ba bdung
349a2: deri ma gror nyan cing / bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa med pa dang / chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du mi byang na yang ngas de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs khrobar mi 'gyur/ mi bzod par mi
349a3: 'gyur/ thugs mi ches par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gnyis pa'o// la la rnab btung de rim gror nyan cing / bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog la/ chos dang gnyer ba'i
349a4: tshes la nan tan du byed/ la la rna ba btung de rim gror mi nyan cing / bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa med de/ chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du mi byed kyang des de bzhin gshegs pa
349a5: dgyes pa'am/ thugs khro ba gnyis su mi 'gyur te/ thams cad du dgongs pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen par btang snyoms su rnam par spyod pa 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum pa'o// de la de bzhin
349a6: gshegs pa'i chos nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid gang zhe na/ gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don yod pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la dus las mi
349a7: 'da' ba ste/ / de ni nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid ces bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad ni nyon mongs pa
349a8: spangs kyang / de dag la lus kyi 'gyur ba yod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni de lta bu yang mi mnga' ste/ de ni bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa zhes bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje
349b1: chen po gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po gang dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi brda nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gzigs pa'i phyir dus thams cad tu 'jig rten la nyin lan gsum
349b2: mtshan lan gsum du rtog pa mdzad ces bya ste/ dngos su na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba la gzigs pa rtag par 'byung
349b3: se/ de ni thugs rje chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brkyang gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o// ca co mi mnga'o// dgongs
349b4: pa nyams pa mi mnga'o/ / 'du shes sna tshogs pa mi mnga'o// thugs mnyam par ma gzhag pa mi mnga'o// ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'o// mos pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// brtson 'grus yongs
349b5: su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ / dgongs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// rnam
349b6: par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ / sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro
349b7: ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // 'das pa'i dus la ma chags mthogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug
349b8: ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug ste/ de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi tshes ma 'dras
350a1: pa rnams so/ / rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang la dmigs pa med pa dran pas dbang sgyur bzhi pa'i rnam pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid
350a2: med pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o/ / de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan
350a3: dang zhabs shin du gnas pa dang / phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba dang / phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / bdun shin du mtho ba dang / sor mo ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang /
350a4: sku che zhing drang ba dang / zhabs legs par mtho ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil pa dang / ri dgas e ne ya'i byin pa lta bu dang / phyag brla drang por slebs pa dang / gsang ba'i gnas/
350a5: sbubs su nub pa dang / gser gyi kha dog dang / mdog shin du 'jam pa dang / spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa dang / seng ge'i ro stod lta bu dang /
350a6: phrag pa'i lhan mdzes par grub pa dang / phrag so shin du rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang / shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa dang / ljags shin du yangs pa dang /
350a7: tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu dang / tshems shin du dkar ba dang / tshems shin du mnyam pa dang // tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba dang / spyan
350a8: dkar nag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa mu khyud can lte ba dang bcas pa/ rnam pa thams
350b1: cad yongs su rdzogs pa 'di lta ste/ rus pa 'am ba so la gzugs brkos pa dang 'dra ba mnga' bas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'o// zhabs kyi mthil gnyis mnyam par sa la
350b2: 'jog cing / zhabs zhum pa med pas zhabs shin du gnas pa'o// ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bar 'brel bas/ phyag da shabs dra bar 'brel ba'o// shing bal gyi
350b3: le'u wAr shin du 'jam zhing gzhon pas/ phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa'o// phyag dang zhabs dang mgur gyi lhun shin du mtho bas bdun shin du mtho ba'o// phyag dang zhabs
350b4: sor mo ring ba'o/ / rting pa ring bas rting pa yangs pa'o// sku lag pa bdun du 'phags la drang bas sku che zhing drang ba'o// pus mo'i lha nga dang long bu mdzes par nub pas zhabs legs par mtho
350b5: ba'o/ / spu gyen du g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bas/ yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil pa'o// ri dgas e ne ya'i byin pa dang / smyig ma dang / ldum bu dar pa ltar drang zhing ma nyams la rims kyis
350b6: gzhol bar grub cing / byin pa zlum pas ri dgas e ne ya'i byin pa lta bu'o// brla drang por bzhag ste ma btud kyang phyag gi mthil gnyis kyi sa pus mo'i lha nga la reg pas phyag brla drang por
350b7: slebs pa'o/ / glang po dang / rta cang shes ltar gsang ba'i gnas shin du mdzes par sbubs su nub pas/ gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa'o// shin du spangs pa'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu
350b8: dang ldan pas gser gyi kha dog go/ gser dang / dngul shin du sbyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing snyoms pa'i mdog tu 'dug la sku la rdul mi 'go bas/ mdog shin du 'jam pa'o// shin du rnam par
351a1: phye ba'i spu re rer skyes shing / gnyis su med pa ba s+phu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba'o// me tog kun da dang zla ba dang 'o ma dang / ba mo'i mdog ltar 'dug la nyi ma dang zla ba ban+d+ha
351a2: las kyang 'phags par 'od gsal ba'i mdzod spus smin 'tshams shin du brgyan pas/ zhal mdzod spras brgyan pa'o// ro stong che bas seng ge'i ro stong ngo // mgur dang rgyud legs par 'brel cing
351a3: lhun zlum pas/ phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa'o// gser gyi gtan pa shin du phyis pa ltar phrag so legs par grub pas phrag so shin du rgyas pa'o// rlung dang mkhris pa dang bdakan gyis ma
351a4: nyams shing / rnam par shes pa 'dra ba med pas ro bro ba'i mchog go/ sku chu zheng 'dom du mnyam pas shing n+ya gro da ltar chu zheng gab pa'o// spyi gtsug zlum zhing legs la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil
351a5: pa dang ldan pa'i dbu mnyam shing legs par grub la/ mdzes pa mnga' bas dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o// me tog ut+pal dmar po'i mdab ma'i kha dog ltar 'dug cing shin du yangs pas
351a6: ljags shin du yangs shing srab pa'o/ / tshangs pa dang / bya ka la bing ka lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs so// 'gram pa me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar legs par grub cing mdzes
351a7: par skyes te/ yid tu 'ong bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'o// me tog kun da dang dung gi bcag 'phro ltar shin du dkar ba'i tshems mnga' bas/ tshems shin du dkar ba'o// tshems la mthon
351a8: dman med pas tshems mnyam pa'o/ / tshems 'tshams ma dod pas tshems thags bzang ba'o// bla 'og tu gye gu med pas tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba'o// dkar nag gi cha ma 'dres la
351b1: shin du rnam par dag cing / mdog dmar pos ma yog pas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa'o// rdzi ma bla 'og shin du legs par gnas la ma 'dzings pas pa'i rdzi ma lta bu'o// de la bla ma'i bsu skyal dang
351b2: chos mnyan pa la sdong pa dang / gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten rjes su bsgrub pa la sogs pa la/ phu rung du byas pas/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa ste/ de ni 'khor shin
351b3: du mang ba'i snga ltas so/ / yi dam la brtan pas zhabs shin du gnas pa ste/ de ni mi g.yo zhing shin du brtan pa'i snga ltas so// sbyin pa dang ngag snyan pa dang / don spyod pa dang / don 'thun pa'i
351b4: bsdu rnam bzhi goms par byas pas/ phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel ba ste/ de ni myur du 'dul ba'i snga ltas so// bza' ba dang bca' ba dang btung ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba byin pas/ phyag
351b5: dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / bdun shin du mtho ba ste/ de gnyis ni bza' ba dang bca' ba dang btung ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba thob pa'i snga ltas so// bcings pa bkrol ba dang /
351b6: srog gi rim gro byas pa dang srog gcod pa spangs pas/ sor mo ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing drang ba ste/ de ni sku tshe ring ba'i snga ltas so// dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs
351b7: pa dang / bzung ba mngon par spel cing 'grib par ma byas pas/ zhabs kyi gong mtho ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba ste/ de ni mi nyam pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i snga ltas so// rig pa dang
351b8: bzo'i las rim gror byas shing / gzhan byin pa dang bdag gis blangs pas/ ri dgas e ne ya'i byin pa lta bu ste/ de ni myur du 'dzin pa'i snga ltas so// bdog cing yod pa'i nor la blangs na
352a1: mi 'god par gtong zhing med ces ma byas pas/ phyag brla drang por slebs pa ste/ de ni yo byad la mnga' ba dang dul ba'i snga ltas so// 'grogs po dang mdza' bshes dang gnyen pa ma bya ba
352a2: dang / bye bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams tshangs pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang / gsang ba'i tshig yongs su bsrungs pas/ gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa ste/ de ni bu med pa'i snga ltas
352a3: so/ / stan dang kos dang / khang pa dang gzhal med khang dang / gnas bzang po byin pas gser gyi kha dog dang / mdog shin du 'jam pa ste/ de gnyis ni gdan dang / na bza' dang / khang pa dang /
352a4: gzhal med khang dang / gnas bzang po 'thob pa'i snga ltas so// 'du 'ji spangs pa dang / mkhan po dang slob dpon dang / pa ma dang phu nu la sogs pa bla ma rnams la tshul dang 'dra bar rim gror byas pa dang /
352a5: btsun par byas pa dang / bcol ba rnal ma gzin pas sA re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa ste/ de ni mnyam pa med pa'i snga ltas so// mi snyan par mi zer zhing mi
352a6: smod la snyan par smra zhing legs par bshad pa 'thun par 'dzin pas/ seng ge'i ro stong lta bu dang phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa ste/ de ni thub pa med pa'i snga ltas so// na ba rnams la rtsi dang rim
352a7: gro dang / sman pa dang / nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pa dang / rim gror byas pas phrag so shin du rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog ste/ de ni nang nyung ba'i snga ltas so// bskyed mos tshal dang 'khor
352a8: dang btung ba dang / rdzing bu dang rgal dka' ba'i zam pa dang / kha zas dang / phreng ba'i gnas dang / sngags dang / gtsug lag khang bya ba la sogs pa la gzhan mas par bya ba sngon du gtong zhing / bdag
352b1: gis gzhan byin pas shing mgro ltar chu zhing gab pa dang / dbu ste gtsug dang ldan pa ste/ de ni mnga' chen po mnga' ba'i snga ltas so// yun ring por tshig snyan cing 'jam pa dang nyams su bde bar smras
352b2: pas/ ljags shin du yangs shing srab pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs tid gnyis ni yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung mnga' ba'i snga ltas so// gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su shes shing
352b3: rnam par shes par 'gyur ba dang / mnyan na dga' zhing mi mthun pa med pa dang / zab cing dbyangs rjes su 'byung ba dang / gtang mi za zhing rnar snyan pa dang ma'akhrugs shing gsal ba'o// yun ring pon
352b4: tshig kyal ba spangs shing dus su smra sbubs seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu ste/ de ni tshig kun gyis mnyan pa'i snga ltas so// rim gror bya ba dang brnyas pa med pa gnyis kyis 'tshe ba yongs su dag pas tshems shin
352b5: budakar ba dang mnyam pa ste/ de ni 'khor snga nas bsags pa'i snga ltas so// yun ring po nas bden zhing phra ma med pa'i tshig smra smrabs tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcur tshang ba
352b6: de ni 'khor dbyer mi byed pa'i snga ltas so/ / pang gis khyud pa bzhin du nyes par bsam pa med la ma chags mi sdang ba dang / rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis lta lta bas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang pa'i rdzi ma
352b7: bu ste/ de ni kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so// rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu gang zhe na/ 'di
352b8: lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las dben pa ste/ sen mo zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gnyen bshes
353a1: byams pa dang 'dra bar sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sen mo'i mdog snum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rigs dang rgyud mthon por byung ba ste/
353a2: sen mo mtho ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul la kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' ba ste/ sor mo zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin du tshogs pa ste/ sor mo
353a3: rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis grub pa ste/ sor mo rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs dang / gsung dang sku'i phrin las
353a4: dang 'tsho ba shin du dben pa ste/ rtse mi mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa 'grel pa ste/ rtsal mdud pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
353a5: shin du dben pa'i chos mnga' ba ste/ long bu mi mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa thams cad las sgrol ba ste/ zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
353a6: rnams ni mi'i seng ge ste/ seng ge'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i glang po ste/ glang po'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dang pa'i
353a7: rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la bzhud pa ste/ dad pa'i stabs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i khyu mchog ste/ khyu mchog gi stabs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
353a8: ldan 'das rnams ni 'thun pa'i lam mnga' ba ste/ g.yas phyogs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni blta na mdzes pa ste/ mdzes par bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
353b1: ldan 'das rnams ni rtag du thugs yon po mi mnga' ba ste/ ma yo bar bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul rnam par dag pa'i yon tan ston pa ste/ sku shin du legs pa
353b2: yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sdig pa'i chos rnams shin du spangs pa ste/ sku shin du skyengs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos rim gyis ston pa ste/ sku
353b3: rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku dang gsung dang thugs gtsang ma dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin du gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nar
353b4: bzhin gyis thugs 'jam pa dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin du 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku shin du rnam par dag
353b5: pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos dang 'dul ba shin du rdzogs pa ste/ dpe byad shin du rdzogs pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan yangs shing bkra
353b6: bston pa ste/ sku che zhing mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku legs par mnyam pa yin/ sangs rgyas
353b7: bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mchog tu 'jam pa'i chos ston pa ste/ sku shin du gzhon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu zhum pa med pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku
353b8: zhum pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang ba ste/ sku shin du rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yang 'byung ba
354a1: shin du bcom zhing zad pa ste/ sku shin du 'khregs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang / nyid lag legs pa
354a2: ljon pa ste/ yan lag dang nying lags par mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin du rnam par dag pa ste/ snang ba rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa
354a3: yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul dang ldan pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ byal zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad shin
354a4: du sbyangs pa ste/ phyal shin du byang ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nga rgyal gyi de'u bcom pa ste/ phyal ma zhom pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
354a5: rnams ni chos zad pa rnam par zlog pa ste/ phyal phyam mar 'jug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zab mo shin tu thugs su chud pa ste/ lte ba zab pa yin// sangs
354a6: rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'thun par 'dzin pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni slob ma kun nas mdzes pa'i
354a7: dge 'dun mnga' ba ste/ kun nas mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs shin du gtsang ma dang ldan pa ste/ kun spyod pa shin du gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas
354a8: bcom ldan 'das rnasas ni chos nag po bstan pa dang bral ba'i chos dang 'dul ba mnga' ba ste/ sku la sme ba med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shing bal ltar yang ba rab
354b1: tu 'thob pa'i chos ston pa ste/ phyag shing bal ltar shin du 'jam pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang gi skye bo dang skye bo bal la byams pas dge sbyong chen po brnyes pa ste/
354b2: phyag gi ri mo snum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin du zab cing brtan por bzhugs pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bzod pa'i chos
354b3: yangs pa ston pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bslab pa'i gnas ha cang yang mi ring bar 'cha' ba ste/ zhal ha cang yang mi ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas
354b4: bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzugs brnyan 'jig rten thams cad tu bkye ba ste/ zhal la gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam pa sngon du btang
354b5: shing 'dul ba ste/ ljags shin du 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan phra ba'i cho gas dang ldan pa ste/ ljags shin du srab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
354b6: 'das rnams ni byis pa'i skye bo 'dod chags pa rnams kyi chos dang 'dul ba gting dpag par dka' ba ste/ ljags shin du dmar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni glang po'i sgra
354b7: dang 'brug gi sgra lta bur bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba ste/ glang po'i nga ro dang 'brug gi dbyangs dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni snyan cing 'jam pa dang nyams su bde bar smra ba'i
354b8: slob mi mnga' ba ste/ snyan cing 'jam pa dang nyams su bde ba'i gsung dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni srid pa kun tu sbyor ba las 'das pa ste/ tshems mche ba shin
355a1: du zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skye bo rno ba rnams 'dul ba ste/ tshems mche brdo ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
355a2: chos dang 'dul ba shin du dgar ba ste/ tshems mche ba shin du dkar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sa'i phyogs mnyam pa la bzhugs pa ste/ mche ba mnyam pa dang
355a3: ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rim gyis mngon par rtogs pa'i chos ston pa ste/ tshems mche ba rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
355a4: rnams ni shes rab kyi ri mthon po la bzhugs pa ste/ shangs legs par mtho ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ma mnga' ba ste/
355a5: shangs shin du gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos phul du yangs pa mnga' ba ste/ spyan ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
355a6: rnams ni gzigs pa shin du rnam par dag pa ste/ spyan rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi tshogs shin du bsags pa ste/ rdzi ma stug pa yin/
355a7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lha dang lha ma yin dang / skyes bu dang / na chung mchog mig dkar nag 'byes shing pad mo'i mdab ma ltar 'dug pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar bya ba ste/
355a8: spyan dkar nag 'byes shing pad mo'i mdab ma ltar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu yangs pa gzigs pa ste/ smin ma ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
355b1: ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam par 'dul ba la mkhas pa ste/ smin ma 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skyon thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ smin ma'i spu mnyam pa dang ldan pa
355b2: yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snum gyis sems sdum par gyur pa'i skye bo 'dul ba ste/ smin ma sum pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
355b3: chos mchog tu yangs shing don dang ldan pa mnga' ba ste/ snyan legs shing stan shal ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyud las rnam par rgyal ba ste/ snyan mnyam
355b4: yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can bsam pa mnyams pa 'dul ba ste/ snyan gyi dbang po mnyams pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lta ba'i rnam
355b5: pa thams cad yongs su byang ba ste/ zhal 'phral ba legs par grub pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phas kyi rgol ba shin du 'dul ba ste/ zhal 'bral ba dang ldan
355b6: pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni smon lam dam pa shin du rdzogs pa ste/ dbu shin du rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yul gyi bung ba rnam par zlog pa ste/
355b7: dbu bung ba ltar gnag pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang ba'i bag la nyal ba zad par byas pa ste/ dbu stug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
355b8: ldan 'das rnams ni thugs 'jam pas bstan pa'i snying po thugs su chud pa ste/ dbu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu ma 'khrugs pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste/
356a1: dbu mi 'dzid pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bArbad pa'i gsung dang yongs su bral bste/ drang mi rtsub pa yin/ sas rgyas bcom k+Sha n+d+ha 'das rnams ni byung rgyu/
356a2: kyi yan lag spos kyi me tog gis skye bo 'thun par bsgrubs pa ste/ dbu dri zhim pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phya gdong zhabs dpal gyi be'u dang / bkra shis dang / dga' ba 'khyil
356a3: pas brgyan pa yin te/ rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'o// rab 'byor de ltar de lta bu'i chos kyi rnam
356a4: pra de dag gzhan la bshad pa dang / bstan pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
356a5: sems can rnams zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sdud pa yin te/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad tu byung ba'i chos so// /
356a6: e ma ho// rgyal ba'i gsung rab bka' 'gyur 'od phyogs su// gong ma rgyal po ti'i tshang gtso mdzad kyis// lus ngag yid gsum bskol cing 'bad pa dang // nam mkha'i mthas khyab 'gro ba ma lus pa//
356a7: skye ba gcig gis sangs rgyas thob par shog/ ye d+ha rmAb tu pra b+hA ba he tun te ldan ta thAg to h+ya bad ta/ teSh+Tha tsu yo ni ro d+ha e Sha pra d+hi ma hA shra maNaH// ga
